channel.title: Everything You Need To Know About Black Mesa
channel.description:
Here is a video that took me 3 weeks to do, it includes EVERYTHING I could find about BMS!!
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xt0AaR23kx4&lc=yASeGJIZXjmIOu_9JYaW5o9GwpDAobaytBo51qShX2c&feature=inbox[/url]

item.title: Everything You Need To Know About Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
sersoft:

you want valve to think BM is still called BMS? not a good idea

not bad apart from that

The website url is doing a better job at that than the video.

Read full topic

item.title: Everything You Need To Know About Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: dblkion
item.description:
You keep showing old stuff and talk about what things were in 2005…

There are quite alot of leaked screenshots of the current version that show the changes and how better the game looks now, you should have used that !
